headline: Onix Accelerates EMEA Region Expansion, Appoints Vittorio Sanvito as Managing Director
summary: Onix, a data, cloud, and AI services provider and 16-time Google Cloud Partner of the Year, has appointed Vittorio Sanvito as Managing Director for Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), marking an acceleration of the company's presence in the region.

content.title: Onix Accelerates EMEA Region Expansion, Appoints Vittorio Sanvito as Managing Director
content.summary: Onix, a data, cloud, and AI services provider and 16-time Google Cloud Partner of the Year, has appointed Vittorio Sanvito as Managing Director for Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), marking an acceleration of the company's presence in the region.

thumbnail.caption: Onix has continued to push the boundaries of cloud modernization, data modernization, and AI enablement, spearheading large-scale transformations across industries. Onix is also streamlining the data-to-cloud-to-AI journey with a cutting-edge autonomous intelligence platform. (PRNewsfoto/Onix Networking Corp.)
